p: Leaves of Rhamnus prinoides and Dodonaea angustifolia and root barks of Brucea antidysentrica were collected from East Gojjam Zone, Amhara regional state, Ethiopia and authenticated by a taxonomist at the national herbarium unit of Ethiopian public health institute, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia which then deposited with a voucher specimen (number ZT-002, ZT-003, and ZT-004 respectively).
